base.name: Ramp
base.description: Generates a signal that starts at a specified time and value and changes by a specified rate. y(t) = A*(t-t0) if t >= t0.

parameter_definitions.name: slope
parameter_definitions.description: specified rate at which the signal changes.

parameter_definitions.name: start_value
parameter_definitions.description: Initial value of the signal before the start time.

parameter_definitions.name: start_time
parameter_definitions.description: Time in seconds when the output start to change according to the slope value.
